title: Patch Notes
content: a very brief glimpse of Game Developer Land. Breaking up with Karlach by speaking with another companion you're dating the morning after her romance scene won't block her dialogue anymore. Reinstated Gale's last line in his detailed explanation of ceremorphosis and tweaked a dialogue option to react to it.
